description:
A desktop app for ComfyUI, the most powerful and modular diffusion model GUI, api and backend with a graph/nodes interface

ComfyUI Desktop is a packaged way to use ComfyUI and comes bundled with a few things:
- Stable version of ComfyUI from releases
- ComfyUI_frontend
- ComfyUI-Manager
- uv
On startup, it will install all the necessary python dependencies with uv and start the ComfyUI server. The app will automatically update with stable releases of ComfyUI, ComfyUI-Manager, and the uv executable as well as some desktop specific features.
This version includes stability fixes that were required for v0.7.3 to be stable. Sorry for the wait!
What's Changed
- Install setuptools/packaging for Windows ToDesktop by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1538
- Define databaseUrl under userDirectoryPath by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1537
- Add CodeRabbit configuration for automated PR reviews by @christian-byrne in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1548
- Align CodeRabbit config with org-wide settings by @christian-byrne in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1549
- Capture GPU driver version in telemetry by @christian-byrne in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1547
- test: verify comfyui.db creation after install by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1552
- Disable forced NVIDIA torch upgrades by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1543
- Release desktop version 0.7.4 by @benceruleanlu in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1553
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/compare/v0.7.3...v0.7.4
